languages.text: "Вытащил{mf||а} живым?" {n}Маражай позволяет себе тонко улыбнуться.{/n} "Ты выш{mf|ел|ла} цел{mf|ым|ой} из той схватки только потому, что я был на твоей стороне. Твое заблуждение удручающе глубоко".

"Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."
languages.original_text: "Вытащил{mf||а} живым?" {n}Маражай позволяет себе тонко улыбнуться.{/n} "Ты выш{mf|ел|ла} цел{mf|ым|ой} из той схватки только потому, что я был на твоей стороне. Твое заблуждение удручающе глубоко".

traits.locale_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “把我活着拖出竞技场？”{n}玛拉斋露出了一丝微笑。{/n}“你之所以能从那场战斗中全身而退，仅仅是因为我站在你这边罢了。你的自欺欺人真是可悲。”
languages.original_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."

traits.locale_text: “把我活着拖出竞技场？”{n}玛拉斋露出了一丝微笑。{/n}“你之所以能从那场战斗中全身而退，仅仅是因为我站在你这边罢了。你的自欺欺人真是可悲。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「生かし、連れ出してくれただと？」{n}マラズハイはクッと笑みを漏らした。{/n}「お前があの戦いから無事に帰ってこれたのは、俺が味方していたからにすぎない。嫌になる程思い込みが激しいな」
languages.original_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."

traits.locale_text: 「生かし、連れ出してくれただと？」{n}マラズハイはクッと笑みを漏らした。{/n}「お前があの戦いから無事に帰ってこれたのは、俺が味方していたからにすぎない。嫌になる程思い込みが激しいな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Salvarme tú a mí?». {n}Marazhai se permite esbozar una tenue sonrisa.{/n} «El único motivo por el cual terminaste esa pelea de una pieza fue que yo estaba de tu parte. Es deprimente hasta qué punto llegas a engañarte a ti {mf|mismo|misma}».
languages.original_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."

traits.locale_text: «¿Salvarme tú a mí?». {n}Marazhai se permite esbozar una tenue sonrisa.{/n} «El único motivo por el cual terminaste esa pelea de una pieza fue que yo estaba de tu parte. Es deprimente hasta qué punto llegas a engañarte a ti {mf|mismo|misma}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Mon sauveur|Ma sauveuse}, vous ? {n}rétorque Marazhai avec un léger sourire.{/n} Si vous êtes {mf|sorti|sortie} de ce combat en un seul morceau, c'est uniquement parce que j'étais de votre côté. L'aveuglement dont vous faites preuve quant à votre petite personne est proprement consternant. »
languages.original_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Mon sauveur|Ma sauveuse}, vous ? {n}rétorque Marazhai avec un léger sourire.{/n} Si vous êtes {mf|sorti|sortie} de ce combat en un seul morceau, c'est uniquement parce que j'étais de votre côté. L'aveuglement dont vous faites preuve quant à votre petite personne est proprement consternant. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Lebend herausgeschleppt?" {n}Marazhai lässt ein schmallippiges Lächeln zu.{/n} "Ihr habt diesen Kampf nur deshalb unbeschadet überstanden, weil ich an Eurer Seite gekämpft habe. Euer Mangel an Selbsteinschätzung ist wirklich beklagenswert."
languages.original_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."

traits.locale_text: "Lebend herausgeschleppt?" {n}Marazhai lässt ein schmallippiges Lächeln zu.{/n} "Ihr habt diesen Kampf nur deshalb unbeschadet überstanden, weil ich an Eurer Seite gekämpft habe." Euer Mangel an Selbsteinschätzung ist wirklich beklagenswert."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."

languages.text: "Beni sağ salim kurtaran mı?" {n}Marazhai, yapmacık bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "O dövüşten sapasağlam uzaklaşabilmenin tek nedeni, benim senin tarafında olmamdı. Kendini kandırmak, sende can sıkacak kadar yer etmiş."
languages.original_text: "Dragged me out alive?" {n}Marazhai allows himself a thin smile.{/n} "The only reason you walked away from that fight in one piece is because I was on your side. Your self-delusion runs depressingly deep."
